name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Technical Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess extensive expertise in **Linux**, **SQL**, and **Database** management, providing exceptional technical support and documentation in high-performance solutions. My strong foundation in **Bash** and **Shell** scripting complements my abilities in **Windows** and **Networking** environments, ensuring robust system performance and reliability. My experience includes leading cross-functional teams to build and optimize enterprise-grade platforms in the healthcare and financial sectors using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** technologies. 

I have a proven track record in full-stack development with frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, while also leveraging **Azure** and **AWS** cloud services for seamless deployment. I specialize in integrating AI/ML capabilities into applications for predictive analytics and real-time data processing, along with strong knowledge in microservices architecture and event-driven systems. My contributions adhere to compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, ensuring secure application development.
